flawed_nl_solution:
26/2=<<26/2=13>>13 of the purses are genuine.
24/4=<<24/4=6>>6 of the handbags are fake.
24-6=<<24-6=81>>81 of the handbags are genuine.
There are 13+81=<<13+81=94>>94 genuine purses and handbags
#### 94

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
